short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance UMD's SOC by providing additional insights such as average GPA and instructor rating.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Terp Rater enhances the University of Maryland's course registration process by providing students with valuable insights within its schedule of classes. It displays information such as average GPA, available seats, and waitlist numbers next to each course, along with tooltips for more details. The extension also provides instructor ratings when browsing course sections. Powered by PlanetTerp, this tool aims to improve the user experience and make course selection more efficient.

Features:
-Displays average course GPA from PlanetTerp
-Displays a tag for the amount of open seats and sections
-Displays a tag for the amount of students waitlisted and waitlisted sections
-Displays a tag for instructor's average rating from PlanetTerp
-Instructor rating has a popup window displaying additional information such as the most recent reviews from PlanetTerp
